title: Made in Britain (with Siobhain McDonagh MP)
itunes:title: Made in Britain (with Siobhain McDonagh MP)
description:
Siobhain McDonagh, Labour MP for Mitcham and Morden, says a revival in manufacturing is the future for Britain's economy. On London's policing, she tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts it was sad to see Cressida Dick resign under the circumstances. Plus: Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael on the Conservative Party and its tribes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
